VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Computer Science?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Computer Science is arc {Natural Sciences}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Computer Science?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Computer Science is arc {Business}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Natural Sciences} has the largest input flow.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Health Sciences?
SC.A: The total flow output from Health Sciences is {200}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Natural Sciences?

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 151? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {170} from {Natural Sciences} to {Business}, a flow of {179} from {Business} to {Natural Sciences}, a flow of {172} from {Health Sciences} to {Computer Science}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 38? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {28} from {Health Sciences} to {Business}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 84 and 128? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {86} from {Computer Science} to {Business}, a flow of {124} from {Computer Science} to {Health Sciences}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Business to Natural Sciences or from Business to Health Sciences?
NC.A: The flow from {Business} to {Natural Sciences} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Natural Sciences to Computer Science, from Health Sciences to Business, or from Computer Science to Business?
NC.A: The flow from {Computer Science} to {Business} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Business}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Business} and {Natural Sciences}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Health Sciences, Arc Computer Science, Arc Business, Arc Natural Sciences}.
